tool_description: Search Games, Editions, Demos on Epic Store

api_list.name: Search Coming Soon Games
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of games that are coming soon to the Epic Store based on search criteria.

required_parameters.name: searchWords
required_parameters.description: Keywords to search for upcoming games.

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by game categories. Default is 'Games'.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Specify the country for pricing information. Default is 'us'.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Specify the language for the response. Default is 'us'.

api_list.name: Search On Sale Games
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of games currently on sale based on search criteria.

required_parameters.name: searchWords
required_parameters.description: Keywords to search for games on sale.

optional_parameters.name: locale
optional_parameters.description: Specify the language for the response. Default is 'us'.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Specify the country for pricing information. Default is 'us'.

optional_parameters.name: categories
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by game categories. Default is 'Games'.
